name: Endless Space Voyage
description:
A first prototype of a 3D platformer game in space! But it is more that just a platformer. There are enemies that chase you and there is a bossfight when you reach a score of 30 000!

There are also swords you can use to damage enemies. Using swords boosts your speed, so you can also use them for the platforming! The game also contains three special items and a lot of shiny orbs to collect.

How to play:

Download and run the executable file. You should now see a game window pop up and you can play the game!

Controls:

Arrow keys to move. Z to jump.  X to use swords. C to use special items.
